mapper.select: SELECT C.CODE_NAME ,B.BOARD_TYPE ,B.BOARD_NUM ,B.BOARD_TITLE ,B.BOARD_COMMENT ,B.TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) AS NUMROW ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD ) B JOIN COM_CODE C ON B.BOARD_TYPE = C.CODE_ID WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN (#{pageNo}-1)*10 + 1 AND (#{pageNo})*10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD
SELECT C.CODE_NAME ,B.BOARD_TYPE ,B.BOARD_NUM ,B.BOARD_TITLE ,B.BOARD_COMMENT FROM BOARD B JOIN COM_CODE C ON B.BOARD_TYPE = C.CODE_ID WHERE B.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND B.BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}

INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,CREATOR ,CREATE_TIME ,MODIFIER ,MODIFIED_TIME ) VALUES (#{boardType} ,(SELECT TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(BOARD_NUM), 0)+1) FROM BOARD) ,#{boardTitle} ,#{boardComment} ,'SYSTEM' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) ,'SYSTEM' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) )
